NK014(pha)010:0: mchod gar gyi brjed byang mchod sprin rnam par spro ba'i rol mo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK014(pha)010:1: mchod sprin rnam par spro ba'i rol mo zhes bya ba'i gar gyi bstan bcos /
NK014(pha)010:2: dpal bde ba chen po gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)010:3: dbang po'i spyod yul dag pas chos so cog /
NK014(pha)010:4: kun tu bzang po'i rol mor rtag 'char ba'i //
NK014(pha)010:5: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'i gar mkhan mchog de la //
NK014(pha)010:6: btud nas rdo rje gar gyi bstan bcos bya //
NK014(pha)010:7: 'dir dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud dang /
NK014(pha)010:8: zla gsang thig le rnal 'byor nang pa'i tshogs rgyud
NK014(pha)010:9: sogs bla na med pa'i rgyud sde du ma nas
NK014(pha)010:10: gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i lha mo rnams kyi bzhi bsnol
NK014(pha)010:11: dang / su ra to bcu drug gi sgo nas
NK014(pha)010:12: mchod pa'i glu gar ji ltar bsgrub pa'i cho ga
NK014(pha)010:13: rong zom chen pos mdzad pa'i gar yig gi dgongs
NK014(pha)010:15: yun ring po'i dus kyi bskal pas lus ngag gi
NK014(pha)010:16: nyams dang 'gyur ba'i khyad par cung zad nyams pa
NK014(pha)010:17: dag / phyi 'gyur ba'i lag len brgyud pa dang sbyar na mi 'gal bar mthong nas /
NK014(pha)010:18: thun mong gi 'gyur ba ji ltar rigs pa gur
NK014(pha)010:19: gar sogs las kyang kha bskang ste bshad par bya'o
NK014(pha)010:20: // de la re zhig lus 'gyur spyi'i nyams 'don tshul smos te /
NK014(pha)010:22: chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa //
NK014(pha)010:23: yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de //
NK014(pha)010:24: phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis //
NK014(pha)010:25: rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur //
NK014(pha)010:26: yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs //
NK014(pha)010:27: sha rgyas barla ni nu mar 'dud //
NK014(pha)010:28: sked pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par spang //
NK014(pha)010:29: snams kyi ngos kyang che la mdzes //
NK014(pha)010:30: chags pa cung zad tshems kyi gnon //
NK014(pha)010:31: tshems kyi phreng ba kun+d+aa zla //
NK014(pha)010:32: mi drag zlog pa'i dbugs 'byin cing //
NK014(pha)010:33: rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod //
NK014(pha)010:34: phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis //
NK014(pha)010:35: mdun du thal mo bzhag par bya //
NK014(pha)010:36: sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la //
NK014(pha)010:37: pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam //
NK014(pha)010:39: spyir gces pa'i nyams dang ldan pas gar bya ba'i rim pa la /
NK014(pha)010:40: thog mar gnas dben par skyabs sems sngon du 'gro bas lha'i nga rgyal brtan par bzung nas /
NK014(pha)010:41: cha byad rnams sems nyid 'gags pa med pa'i ye
NK014(pha)010:42: shes kyi rol rtsal tsam du rang snang bar sems
NK014(pha)010:43: / lha'i cha byad lta bu'i chas su zhugs nas /
NK014(pha)010:44: gang du las bya ba'i gzhir 'gro ba dang lhan
NK014(pha)010:45: cig khro bo'i brjid glu srin po'i nga ro dang
NK014(pha)010:46: sbyar ba'i sum+b+ha'i glu 'gros kyis bgegs gzhom par bya
NK014(pha)010:47: ste / sum+b+ha dril bu'i 'og tu rdo rje 'greng
NK014(pha)010:48: stabs su bzung rkang g.yas bteg ste 'gro phyogs su
NK014(pha)010:49: gom gang nur nas rkang g.yon grud /
NK014(pha)010:50: ni sum+b+ha de nyid du slar yang rkang g.yas 'debs 'bab /
NK014(pha)010:52: la de khar 'gyings nas dril bu gsil /
NK014(pha)010:53: g+h+rih+na rkang g.yon 'gro phyogs su gom gang nur nas g.yas grud /
NK014(pha)010:54: g+h+ri h+na de nyid du g.yon 'debs 'bab /
NK014(pha)010:57: g+h+rih+na pa ya rkang g.yas 'gro phyogs la rgyab 'gros kyis gom gang nur zhing g.yon phyir grud /
NK014(pha)010:58: de bzhin du lus kyang cung zad gcu /
NK014(pha)010:59: g+h+rih+na pa ya de nyid du slar yang g.yas rgyab nur h'u phata /
NK014(pha)010:61: +aa na ya hoh de nyid du gnas pas rkang
NK014(pha)010:62: g.yon bteg ste rkang mgo g.yon phyogs su cung zad
NK014(pha)010:63: bskor zhing 'gyings / b+ha ga w+aan la rkang stabs de kho na ltar bya /
NK014(pha)010:64: bid+y+aa la cung zad dzam nas /
NK014(pha)010:65: r+aa dza ya mdun du g.yon bteg 'bebs kyis len nas /
NK014(pha)010:67: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil ba dang bcas
NK014(pha)010:68: pas rkang g.yas 'gro phyogs su bor pa'i gom chung
NK014(pha)010:69: ste / tshul des chas 'jug khang pa nas rim par don te dor 'khor ba dang /
NK014(pha)010:70: sum+b+ha 'i glu tshar gcig la gzhan sngar dang 'dra ba las /
NK014(pha)010:72: sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha rkang g.yas bteg ste chos bskor la dal bus bskor nas /
NK014(pha)010:74: la 'gro phyogs su rkang g.yas lcags ris lta bur phab /
NK014(pha)010:76: rkang g.yon mdun du gom gang nur te lus g.yas su gcu /
NK014(pha)010:77: 'gro phyogs la rgyab zur cung zad phyogs pas rkang pa bsnol mar 'ong ba bya ste /
NK014(pha)010:78: de man chad sngar ltar ro //
NK014(pha)010:79: de nas sgeg 'gros kyis dbang po'i spyod yul thams
NK014(pha)010:80: cad lha dang lha mo'i rol par gsal gdab pas
NK014(pha)010:81: mchod pa'i gzhi bzung ba ni /
NK014(pha)010:82: dri za'i rgyud mang 'khrol ba zhes bya ba'i glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:83: lag gnyis dpung thad tsam du phyir gdengs nas rkang g.yas bteg la de nyid du zol 'beb /
NK014(pha)010:84: badz+ra bgying ba dang bcas pas lag gnyis pad bskor dang rkang g.yon 'debs 'bab /
NK014(pha)010:86: mdun du rkang g.yas 'debs 'bab dang lag gnyis kha
NK014(pha)010:87: sbub las phyed pad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
NK014(pha)010:88: lus bag dang bcas pas dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:90: rkang g.yon 'gro phyogs su gom gang phyin nas g.yas brkyang dang /
NK014(pha)010:91: lag gnyis khu tshur g.yon par g.yas pas nang bskor
NK014(pha)010:92: gyi snying ga nas gyes te dpung ba'i thad ka
NK014(pha)010:95: rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i mdun nas 'gro phyogs la gom gang phyin /
NK014(pha)010:96: lag g.yon khu tshur nang bstan gyi sgreng ba'i gru
NK014(pha)010:97: mo'i 'og tu g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang du phyogs
NK014(pha)010:100: rkang g.yon bteg cing lag gnyis gyen bstan mthur bab mas g.yas dang g.yon du gar bsgyur te /
NK014(pha)010:102: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil ba dang bcas
NK014(pha)010:103: pas rkang g.yas mdun du gom gang bor ba'i gom
NK014(pha)010:105: tshul de lan gsum ldab bo //
NK014(pha)010:106: de nas mnyam sbyor las gsungs ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i glu tshig rkang pa drug dang /
NK014(pha)010:108: mu dang ni hu mu dang //
NK014(pha)010:109: hu yi kha brgyan dang bcas pas //
NK014(pha)010:110: lha mo bzhi bsnol gsal bar byed //
NK014(pha)010:111: don dam glu dang chags chen glu //
NK014(pha)010:112: ta th+aa'i glu dang dam tshig glu //
NK014(pha)010:113: thams can bde ba chen po'i glu //
NK014(pha)010:114: zhes pa ltar o sogs glu'i rgyan lnga dang sbyar ba'i /
NK014(pha)010:115: don dam gyi glu sogs glu lnga dang bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin spro ba las /
NK014(pha)010:116: dang po rab dag'i glu 'gros ni /
NK014(pha)010:117: drang srong gi snyems glu shang+kh+aa'i sgra lta bu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:119: dga' ba'i rkang g.yas nang du sngon 'gro'i mnyam pa
NK014(pha)010:120: lag g.yas nang bskor gyi 'og nas steng du 'phyar
NK014(pha)010:121: ba'i dpral thad thal mo dang lag g.yon dril bu
NK014(pha)010:123: bdag lag g.yas g.yon pa'i steng nas phyir 'then cing /
NK014(pha)010:125: la zhes par rkang g.yon nang du btegs 'bab nas /
NK014(pha)010:127: lag g.yas dpung thad gdengs stabs dang /
NK014(pha)010:128: g.yon gdengs gzhol gyi bon bskor la dal bus bskor /
NK014(pha)010:130: rkang g.yon phyir 'then cing rkang g.yas 'debs 'bab kyi g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis snying gar thal sbyar /
NK014(pha)010:131: de bzhin rkang g.yas mdun du zol gyi spos pa'i rgyab tu rkang g.yon bor /
NK014(pha)010:132: lag gnyis thal mo rgyab sprod kyi rnam pa so
NK014(pha)010:133: sor rim phral gyis g.yas dpung reg dang g.yon gdengs
NK014(pha)010:134: gzhol / gshegs pa thams cad rkang g.yas phyir zol
NK014(pha)010:135: ldog nas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu g.yas pa bor zhing
NK014(pha)010:136: gzhol / / lag g.yas rim gyis phab pa'i gdengs gzhol dang /
NK014(pha)010:138: grub par g.yas sngon 'gro'i rkang mnyam /
NK014(pha)010:139: lag g.yas nang bskor steng 'phyar gyi dpral thal dang g.yon gdengs gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:141: de nyid du lus ldem bag dang bcas pas gnas nas lag g.yas dpung reg /
NK014(pha)010:142: de bzhin lag gnyis dpung thad tsam du phyir gdengs nas rkang g.yas g.yas phyogs su 'debs 'bebs /
NK014(pha)010:143: gshegs pa'i rkang g.yon g.yon du 'debs 'bebs dang /
NK014(pha)010:144: lag g.yas g.yon steng nas phyir 'then cing rkang g.yas phyir nur bas dzam nas /
NK014(pha)010:145: dam la rkang g.yon nang du rkyang /
NK014(pha)010:146: pa grub par lag gnyis pad bskor dang /
NK014(pha)010:147: rkang g.yas nang du bor ba'i rgyab tu g.yon dang /
NK014(pha)010:148: g.yon pa'i rgyab tu g.yas nur /
NK014(pha)010:150: rkang g.yon g.yon phyogs su khyer ba'i rol 'bebs dang
NK014(pha)010:151: bstun lag gnyis kyang kha sbub g.yon du mnyam rol
NK014(pha)010:152: / 'a 'i wa rkang g.yas g.yas dang lag gnyis de ldog g.yas rol /
NK014(pha)010:153: 'a 'i rkang g.yon g.yon du bor zhing lag gnyis
NK014(pha)010:154: gyen bstan gzhol gyi mtheb mdzub sprad pa'i se gol
NK014(pha)010:155: / dam tshig rkang g.yon 'debs dang lag gnyis gyen bstan g.yas phyogs su 'phyar /
NK014(pha)010:156: dam pa rkang g.yas 'debs 'bebs dang lag gnyis gyen bstan g.yon 'phyar /
NK014(pha)010:157: grub lag g.yas thugs kar rdo rje 'greng bur bzung
NK014(pha)010:158: ba ldem bag dang bcas pas g.yas su bskor zhing
NK014(pha)010:159: g.yon dril bu gdengs gzhol gyis /
NK014(pha)010:160: rkang g.yas nang du bor ba'i rgyab tu g.yon dang /
NK014(pha)010:164: rkang g.yon phyir 'then dang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:165: lag g.yas dpral thal dang g.yon gdengs gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:166: mchod pa lag gnyis phyir gdengs nas rkang g.yas 'debs chung /
NK014(pha)010:168: rkang lag g.yas phyir 'then gyi dzam nas /
NK014(pha)010:169: thams cad rkang nang du g.yon brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:172: rkang g.yas nang bor gyi rgyab tu g.yon dang /
NK014(pha)010:175: 'a 'i wa rkang g.yas bteg cing lag gnyis chos 'chad /
NK014(pha)010:177: lag g.yas dpung reg dang g.yon gdengs gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:178: mchod pa chen po la g.yas g.yon gyi 'debs chung dzam dang bcas pa sngar ltar las /
NK014(pha)010:180: rkang g.yas nang bor gyi rgyab tu rkang g.yon dang /
NK014(pha)010:182: grub par rkang g.yon dang lag gnyis kha sbub kyi g.yon rol dang /
NK014(pha)010:183: rkang g.yas g.yas phyogs bor zhing /
NK014(pha)010:184: lag gnyis g.yas gzhol gyen bstan gyi mtheb mdzub sprad pa'i se gol /
NK014(pha)010:186: de nyid du lag g.yas dpral thal dang /
NK014(pha)010:188: gnyis pa rgyan lnga dang sbyar ba'i glu lngas mchod sprin spro ba'i glu 'gros ni /
NK014(pha)010:189: wam sa'i 'gyur glu chu bya'i 'gros lta bu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:192: pa na pem la rkang g.yas nang du bor /
NK014(pha)010:194: rkang g.yon g.yas kyi rgyab tu nur /
NK014(pha)010:195: ti pu pa ra mu rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu nur /
NK014(pha)010:196: sarba ta th+aa ga ta g.yon zol 'bebs kyis rkang
NK014(pha)010:197: mnyam rjes la lag gnyis nang du bskor bas dzam
NK014(pha)010:198: nas / sid+d+hi hu la lag gnyis snying gar thal sbyar dang rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:199: sa ma yo ta mu rkang g.yas sngon 'gro'i mdun mnyam dang lag gnyis spyi bor thal sbyar /
NK014(pha)010:200: sarba ma h+aa su kha sid+d+hi hu /
NK014(pha)010:201: rkang g.yon rgyab nur gyis g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis snying gar thal mo sbyar ro //
NK014(pha)010:204: bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dag /
NK014(pha)010:205: me tog bdug pa mar me mchog /
NK014(pha)010:206: dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'i mchog /
NK014(pha)010:207: gang ba'am ste stong pa'ang rung //
NK014(pha)010:208: zhes gsungs pa'i phyag chen dang sbyar nas lha mo bzhi bsnol dbul ba'i glu 'gros ni /
NK014(pha)010:209: glu rta snga ma nyid de bskul mtshams med par sbrel la /
NK014(pha)010:211: rkang g.yon 'gro phyogs su phyin pa'i rtser rkang g.yas 'bebs pa dang mnyam du /
NK014(pha)010:212: badz+ra r+aa ga d+hu pe d+hu /
NK014(pha)010:213: zhes lag gnyis khu tshur snying ga'i thad nas mthur du sbub pa bdug pa'i rgya bca' /
NK014(pha)010:214: sh+r+ai rkang g.yas nang bskor gyis yong phyogs su log
NK014(pha)010:215: pa'i rtser g.yon phab cing rkang g.yas phyir 'then pa
NK014(pha)010:216: dang mnyam du / badz+ra r+aa ga push+pe pu /
NK014(pha)010:217: khu tshur gyen bstan gyi me tog 'thor tshul /
NK014(pha)010:218: sh+r+ai g.yon 'gros kyi log pa'i rkang rtser g.yas phab cing g.yon phyir nur gyis /
NK014(pha)010:219: badz+ra r+aa ga +aa lo ke h+r+aih zhes khu tshur
NK014(pha)010:220: g.yas g.yon mthe bong gnyis sbreng ba mar me'i sdong
NK014(pha)010:221: bu 'dzin tshul / sh+r+ai g.yas 'gros kyi log pa'i rkang rtser g.yas phab cing g.yon phyir nur gyis /
NK014(pha)010:223: zhes thal mo gnyis phyir bstan dri byug pa'i tshul te /
NK014(pha)010:224: 'di bzhi so so'i phyag chen bcings pa dang lus
NK014(pha)010:225: cung zad dgye bas mchod pa 'bul ba ltar bya'o
NK014(pha)010:226: // de nas zla gsang thig le las /
NK014(pha)010:227: thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te //
NK014(pha)010:228: rdo rje bcings byas bcings bcas yang par bya //
NK014(pha)010:229: de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de //
NK014(pha)010:230: mda' yis tshul du bzung bar bya //
NK014(pha)010:231: zhes gsungs pa la sogs par so so'i phyag chen
NK014(pha)010:232: su ra ta'i sngags dang sbyar te lha mo bcu
NK014(pha)010:233: drug gi gar bya ba ni /
NK014(pha)010:234: sgeg mo'i snyems glu pi wang 'gyur gdangs lta bu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:236: ni rab dgyes gtso la lag gnyis pad bskor /
NK014(pha)010:237: rkang pa g.yas nang du thad kar bor ba'i g.yon du rkang g.yon dang /
NK014(pha)010:239: g.yas kyi rgyab tu g.yon bor ba ni gar gyi gzhi bca' ba ste /
NK014(pha)010:240: 'og tu rkang lag stabs cig dang 'dra ba la bzhi pad dang /
NK014(pha)010:241: rkang pa 'dra ba la gzhi bca' zhes zer ro //
NK014(pha)010:243: rkang g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis kha sbub mnyam brkyang las gyen bstan so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:244: pha rol rkang g.yon brkyang dang lag gnyis dbung reg /
NK014(pha)010:246: rkang g.yas g.yon gyi byin par bsdu zhing lag gnyis thugs kar chos 'chad kyi rgya /
NK014(pha)010:247: sangs rgyas rnams kyi lag gnyis kha sbub phyed pad
NK014(pha)010:248: kyis blangs pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa sgeg mo'i
NK014(pha)010:249: tshul dang rkang g.yas btegs mtshams kyi chos bskor la
NK014(pha)010:250: dal bus bskor / myos byed pa //
NK014(pha)010:251: rkang g.yas bteg cing lag gnyis g.yas kyi pus mo'i
NK014(pha)010:252: thad nas khyer te g.yon phyogs su thal mo gyen
NK014(pha)010:254: de las rkang lag ldog nas bya ba dang /
NK014(pha)010:255: g.yas g.yon gyi khyams bcas pa'i mthar rkang g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis gyen bstan so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:256: dpa' bo thams cad g.yas sngon 'gro'i rkang pa mdun mnyam dang /
NK014(pha)010:257: lag gnyis dpral bar thal sbyar /
NK014(pha)010:259: rkang g.yon phyir nur zhing g.yas brkyang dang /
NK014(pha)010:260: lag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar 'greng /
NK014(pha)010:262: de nas lnga pa'i klu zhes pa me tog ldan
NK014(pha)010:263: dus khu byug sgrogs pa lta bu dang sbyar te
NK014(pha)010:264: / su ra ta lag gnyis phyed pad 'khyud rgya /
NK014(pha)010:265: ma no b+ha wa h+r+aih rdo rje thal mo las
NK014(pha)010:266: rdo rje bcings te srin lag gnyis brkyang pa cung
NK014(pha)010:267: zad g.yon du bskor nas g.yon du rtse mo phyogs
NK014(pha)010:268: pa mda' bzung ba'i tshul lo //
NK014(pha)010:269: p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra lag gnyis gyen bstan par bsnol dang rkang pa gzhi bca' /
NK014(pha)010:270: s+pha ra na ma ye h'u /
NK014(pha)010:271: lag g.yon dkur brten cing g.yas mchog sbyin smin mtshams su phyar /
NK014(pha)010:272: rkang g.yas bteg mtshams kyis chos skor du bskor mthar g.yas mchod sbyin gyis gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:273: te rkang g.yas brkyang lag g.yas tshigs phyir 'byin dang g.yon dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:275: rkang lag g.yon bteg pa'i gar dang /
NK014(pha)010:276: na rkang lag g.yas bteg pa'i gar te /
NK014(pha)010:279: lag gnyis tshigs nang 'byin g.yas g.yon re mos khyer mthar gyen bstan so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:280: te bzhi pad mthar g.yas brkyang dang lag 'khyud rgya /
NK014(pha)010:281: na lag gnyis gyen bstan g.yon du khyer te mtheb gung sprad pa'i se gol sgra bya ste /
NK014(pha)010:283: rdo rje se gol gtog pa yis //
NK014(pha)010:284: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
NK014(pha)010:286: te zhes bya ba glu yi rgyu //
NK014(pha)010:287: thams cad dga' bas rab bsgrub pa //
NK014(pha)010:288: na ni shin tu rnam 'phrul ba'o //
NK014(pha)010:289: zhes pa ltar rgyud gzhan las kyang te na dang sbyar ba'i glu mang du byung ba ltar dang /
NK014(pha)010:290: p+au dza me g+ha sogs mchod sprin spro ba'i sngags
NK014(pha)010:291: kyang karma m+aa ler gsungs pas 'dir yang sbyar ro
NK014(pha)010:292: // de'i rgyas gdab karma m+aa le las /
NK014(pha)010:293: ka ka la yi glu yi dbyangs //
NK014(pha)010:294: dus su rab zhi blang bar bya //
NK014(pha)010:295: zhes 'byung ba ltar rab zhi'i 'dar khugs kyi glu dang /
NK014(pha)010:296: pho rog mdo sde mgon gyi phyag srol las byung ba'i dril stabs rgya sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:297: phyag rkang g.yas g.yon 'debs 'bebs dang lag pa'i dzam len nas /
NK014(pha)010:298: wa rkang g.yas 'gro phyogs su bor //
NK014(pha)010:299: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil //
NK014(pha)010:301: rgya wa g.yas skyabs sbyin dang g.yon dril bu gsil /
NK014(pha)010:302: 'di ya rkang g.yas rkang g.yon gyi rting pa'i phyi logs su bor zhing lag g.yas mnyam bzhag /
NK014(pha)010:303: 'e ya rkang g.yon g.yas pa'i rtsar bsdu zhing /
NK014(pha)010:305: yis phyag skyabs sbyin dril gsil nas rkang g.yon btegs pa'i dzam len /
NK014(pha)010:306: rgyas ya rdor gsor dril gsil /
NK014(pha)010:310: btab wa rkang g.yas g.yon gyi rting pa'i phyi logs su bor zhing lag mnyam bzhag /
NK014(pha)010:312: rkang g.yon bsdu zhing lag g.yas mchog sbyin /
NK014(pha)010:314: 'o wa'i ya'i phyi ma'i dzam blangs te /
NK014(pha)010:315: gsang ba'i snying ga'i pad+mo la //
NK014(pha)010:316: shin tu dgyes pas mnyes par gyur //
NK014(pha)010:317: zhes rkang pa phyi ma gnyis la'ang 'gros snga ma nyid ldab bo //
NK014(pha)010:318: yang sgeg mo'i snyems glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:323: g.yas pa'i gar bsgyur nas rkang g.yas bteg ste chos skor la bskor /
NK014(pha)010:324: bdud rnams rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu bor /
NK014(pha)010:325: lag g.yon khu tshur nang bstan du sgreng ba'i gru
NK014(pha)010:326: mo'i 'og tu g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang du bzhag
NK014(pha)010:328: rkang pa gzhi bca' dang lag gnyis gyen bstan par bsnol gyi mthar /
NK014(pha)010:329: so sor gzhol zhing rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:330: rgyal ba rkang g.yon brkyang dang lag gnyis dpung reg /
NK014(pha)010:332: g.yas g.yon gyi gar khyams bcas mthar lag gnyis gyen bstan so sor gzhol zhing rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:333: thams cad 'di yis rkang mdun mnyam dang lag gnyis dpral thal /
NK014(pha)010:335: rkang g.yon phyir nur zhing g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis 'khyud rgyas lnga pa'i glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:336: su ra ta phyed pad 'khyud rgya /
NK014(pha)010:337: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai li h'u /
NK014(pha)010:339: lag sngar mda' bzung ba'i tshul gyi phyag rgya de nyid snying gar btsugs pa'o //
NK014(pha)010:340: p+au dza me g+ha man chad sngar ltar ro //
NK014(pha)010:341: phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste //
NK014(pha)010:342: rdo rje pad mo phye ba yis //
NK014(pha)010:343: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu //
NK014(pha)010:344: mdzes pa'i skyon dang rol cing 'gro //
NK014(pha)010:345: zhes rgyas gdab 'di la yang snga ma'i mda' rgya snying gar btsugs pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do //
NK014(pha)010:346: rdo thal snying gar bcas nas /
NK014(pha)010:347: phyag rgya 'di na chu srin zhes //
NK014(pha)010:348: rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin //
NK014(pha)010:349: rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste //
NK014(pha)010:350: 'dod chags bral bar grub pa yin //
NK014(pha)010:351: su ra ta badz+ra smre h+aa h+r+aih zhes pa'i sngags
NK014(pha)010:352: la rdor thal de nyid bcings pa gyen du bzung
NK014(pha)010:355: rgya de nyid ma bshig par /
NK014(pha)010:356: 'di ni chags pa thams cad la //
NK014(pha)010:357: 'dod chags bde byed snyoms pa thob //
NK014(pha)010:359: dngos grub myur du thob par byed //
NK014(pha)010:361: de bzhin du glu 'gros med pa thams cad la /
NK014(pha)010:362: lha mo re re la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gnyis kyi /
NK014(pha)010:363: dang po phyag rgya rtsa ba'i tshigs bcad rnams la phyag rgya'i rgyu rdo rje thal mo dang /
NK014(pha)010:364: sngags rnams la so so'i phyag chen bsgyur zhing p+au dza sogs kyi sham bu yang mi sbyar ro //
NK014(pha)010:365: phyi ma rgyas 'debs kyi tshigs bcad la'ang rang rang gi phyag chen ma bshig par 'jog pa ste /
NK014(pha)010:366: 'og ma thams cad 'gre shes par bya'o //
NK014(pha)010:367: rdor thal mnyam du bzung nas 'gying ba'i gar gyis
NK014(pha)010:368: bskor la khu tshur gnyis la 'gying ba dang bcas
NK014(pha)010:369: pas dkur g.yon du brten te /
NK014(pha)010:370: phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs //
NK014(pha)010:371: bde ba dam pas mchod byas te //
NK014(pha)010:372: 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na //
NK014(pha)010:373: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par byed //
NK014(pha)010:374: su ra ta badz+ra gar+b+he h'u /
NK014(pha)010:375: phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas //
NK014(pha)010:376: sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:377: khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che //
NK014(pha)010:378: dpal gyi bsgyings pa thob par 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:379: zhes pa'i rgyas btab 'di la'ang rab zhi'i 'dar khug dang sbyar ba'i glu 'gros sngar bzhin no //
NK014(pha)010:380: de nas sgeg mo'i snyems glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:382: ni rkang g.yas sngon 'gro'i mdun mnyam dang /
NK014(pha)010:383: lag g.yon dkur brten zhing g.yas thal mo gyen bstan smin mtshams su 'degs /
NK014(pha)010:384: sangs rgyas rkang g.yon phyir nur rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu bor zhing /
NK014(pha)010:385: lag gnyis thal mo gyen bstan nu mar reg /
NK014(pha)010:388: lag gnyis gyen bstan bar bsnol mthar so sor gzhol zhing rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:389: rmad byung rkang g.yas g.yas kyi nang du bor ba'i rgyab tu rkang g.yon 'then cing /
NK014(pha)010:390: lag gnyis khu tshur gyen bstan las /
NK014(pha)010:391: g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis blangs te mdzub mo nas rim gyis bkrol bas gyen du 'thor tshul /
NK014(pha)010:393: bzhi pad mthar rkang pa g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis gyen bstan so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:394: sbyor ba rkang pa g.yon brkyang zhing lag g.yas dpung reg dang g.yon dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:396: g.yas g.yon gyi khyams bcas mthar lag gnyis so sor gyen gzhol dang rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:397: thams cad rkang g.yon sngon 'gro'i mdun mnyam /
NK014(pha)010:398: lag gnyis thal mo gyen bstan gshibs te smin mtshams su 'phyar /
NK014(pha)010:400: rkang g.yas phyir nur zhing g.yon brkyang dang thal mo snying gar sbyor /
NK014(pha)010:401: lnga pa'i glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:404: badz+ra ma du ga te gum gum /
NK014(pha)010:405: rkang pa gnyis kyi pus mo'i lha nga brkyang zhing sor mo phyir bstan pa sa ga'i stabs dang /
NK014(pha)010:406: lag pa rdo rje thal mo las 'dab ma gar dang bcas pas myur du steng du dor ba'o //
NK014(pha)010:409: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:410: rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma //
NK014(pha)010:411: rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa'i //
NK014(pha)010:412: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
NK014(pha)010:414: lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas pas 'og tu
NK014(pha)010:415: dor nas steng du cung zad bsgyur bar byas te
NK014(pha)010:416: / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:417: bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa //
NK014(pha)010:418: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
NK014(pha)010:419: bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:420: su ra ta badz+ra me g+ha tam tam /
NK014(pha)010:421: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:422: yid kyi dngos grub thob byed de //
NK014(pha)010:424: yid dges skad cig grub par byed //
NK014(pha)010:425: rdor thal las mthe bong gnyis sgreng ste lhag ma nyi ma ltar byas la /
NK014(pha)010:426: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:427: ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa //
NK014(pha)010:428: thog ma med nas dri mas bgos //
NK014(pha)010:430: su ra ta badz+ra sha ra da a a /
NK014(pha)010:431: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:432: ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa //
NK014(pha)010:433: yi ge phyag rgya 'dis btab na //
NK014(pha)010:434: sangs rgyas ye shes mchod par byed //
NK014(pha)010:435: lag pa g.yas g.yon brjid pas gar bya zhing thal
NK014(pha)010:436: mo mnyam por byas la g.yon gyi mkhur tshos nas
NK014(pha)010:438: rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di //
NK014(pha)010:439: mchod pa thams cad sgrub byed de //
NK014(pha)010:440: thams cad don rnams bsgrub pas dge //
NK014(pha)010:441: bkra shis rnam rgyal thob par byed //
NK014(pha)010:442: su ra ta badz+ra she sh+ri ho hah 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:443: sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro //
NK014(pha)010:444: sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni //
NK014(pha)010:445: sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo //
NK014(pha)010:446: zhes pa'i rgyas btab 'di la'ang rab zhi'i 'dar khug gi glu dang sbyar ba'i 'gros bya'o //
NK014(pha)010:447: de nas sgeg mo'i snyems glu dang sbyar te //
NK014(pha)010:449: ni sangs rgyas rkang pa gzhi bca' dang /
NK014(pha)010:450: lag g.yon dkur brten g.yas thal mo gyen bstan mdun du phyir bskor /
NK014(pha)010:452: rkang g.yas bteg mtshams kyi chos skor du bskor zhing
NK014(pha)010:453: lag g.yas thal mo nang bstan g.yon mig gi thad
NK014(pha)010:454: ka'i g.yas phyogs su khyer mthar g.yas su gyen gzhol
NK014(pha)010:455: / shin tu sgeg pas rkang pa gzhi bca' dang lag gnyis bar bsnol gyen bstan /
NK014(pha)010:457: rkang g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis khu tshur phyir bstan dpung pa'i thad tsam du 'phyar /
NK014(pha)010:458: pad+mo'i rkang mnyam lag g.yas dpung reg dang g.yon dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:460: g.yas g.yon khyams kyi mthar lag gnyis gyen gzhol dang rkang g.yas brkyang /
NK014(pha)010:461: rdo rje rkang mdun mnyam lag g.yon dkur brten dang g.yas mchog sbyiin smin mtshams su 'degs /
NK014(pha)010:463: rkang g.yas phyir nur zhing g.yon brkyang dang thal mo snying gar sbyar /
NK014(pha)010:464: lnga pa'i glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:465: he ma h+aa phyed pad 'khyud rgya /
NK014(pha)010:466: su ra ta bi l+aa si ni tra tra /
NK014(pha)010:467: rkang gnyis sor mo phyir bstan pa las pus mo
NK014(pha)010:468: dmad pa zlum po'i stabs dang lag rdo rje khu
NK014(pha)010:469: tshur gnyis sgeg pa'i tshul gyis bkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:472: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:473: sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin //
NK014(pha)010:474: 'di dang mnyam par sbyar ba yis //
NK014(pha)010:475: sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par byed //
NK014(pha)010:476: rdor thal rgod pa'i tshul du kun tu bskor nas khu tshur gnyis kha 'gram du bzhag nas /
NK014(pha)010:477: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:478: bzhad mor yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
NK014(pha)010:479: rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la //
NK014(pha)010:480: gsang ba chen po'i mgu bar byed //
NK014(pha)010:481: he ma h+aa su ra ta badz+ra ha s+ya ha hah yi ge phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
NK014(pha)010:482: nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na //
NK014(pha)010:483: phreng ba rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
NK014(pha)010:484: dpal ldan de ma thag du 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:485: lag g.yon khu tshur nang bstan gyis sgrengs pa'i gru
NK014(pha)010:486: mo'i 'og tu g.yas pa'i khu tshur mdzub mo sgrengs
NK014(pha)010:487: pa nang du phyogs pas pi wam gi rgyud brdung
NK014(pha)010:489: ji snyed yid 'ong glu dag ni //
NK014(pha)010:490: 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba dag /
NK014(pha)010:491: sgra yis bskyed pa rnam 'gyur ba //
NK014(pha)010:492: de mthun dbyangs 'dir sgrub par byed //
NK014(pha)010:493: he ma h+aa su ra ta badz+ra g+airti te te /
NK014(pha)010:494: sems kyi phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di //
NK014(pha)010:495: 'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dag /
NK014(pha)010:496: sbyor ba 'di yis sbyar ba yis //
NK014(pha)010:498: rdor thal nyid gar gyi sbyor bas bsgyur nas mthar
NK014(pha)010:499: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor bzhag
NK014(pha)010:500: ste / ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las //
NK014(pha)010:501: 'gyur bar byed par bshad pa dang //
NK014(pha)010:502: ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya rnams //
NK014(pha)010:504: he ma h+aa su ra ta badz+ra n+ri t+ye pe ba pe ba /
NK014(pha)010:506: bde ldan gar ni byed cing spro //
NK014(pha)010:507: 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du //
NK014(pha)010:508: sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs gcig 'grogs //
NK014(pha)010:510: rab zhi'i 'dar khug gi glu dang 'gros bya'o //
NK014(pha)010:511: de nas yang sgeg mo'i snyems glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:513: yis rkang pa mdun mnyam dang /
NK014(pha)010:514: lag g.yas pa g.yon pa'i nang nas phyir bton nas
NK014(pha)010:515: mchog sbyin las mtheb mdzub sprad pa'i tshig nang byin
NK014(pha)010:517: sangs rgyas rkang g.yas phyir nur zhing rkang g.yon g.yas pa'ii rgyab tu bor /
NK014(pha)010:518: lag g.yas g.yon par nang bskor las skyabs sbyin dang /
NK014(pha)010:521: rkang g.yon phyir nur zhing g.yas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu bor /
NK014(pha)010:522: lag gnyis gyen bstan bar bsnol las kha sbub so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:523: shin tu rmad byung bzhi pad /
NK014(pha)010:525: rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i byin par bsdu zhing lag gnyis snying gar thal mo kha phye ba steng 'og /
NK014(pha)010:526: rnal 'byor rkang mnyam lag g.yas dpung reg dang g.yon dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:528: g.yas g.yon gyi khyams mthar rkang g.yas brkyang dang lag gnyis gyen bstan so sor gzhol /
NK014(pha)010:530: lag g.yon dkur brten dang g.yas mchog sbyin smin mtshams /
NK014(pha)010:532: rkang g.yas phyir nur dang g.yon brkyang zhing /
NK014(pha)010:533: lag gnyis thugs kar thal sbyar /
NK014(pha)010:534: lnga pa'i glu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:535: su ra ta phyed pad 'khyud rgya /
NK014(pha)010:536: badz+ra ma h+aa bi shwa r+au pi dza dzah rkang
NK014(pha)010:537: g.yon drang po dang rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i rgyab tu
NK014(pha)010:538: nur nas pus mo cung zad dma' /
NK014(pha)010:539: lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags
NK014(pha)010:540: kyu ltar byas pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis bzhag
NK014(pha)010:541: / p+au dza me g+ha man chad sngar ltar ro //
NK014(pha)010:542: phyag rgya ye shes rmad byung ba //
NK014(pha)010:543: 'di ni thabs kyis mnyam bzhag na //
NK014(pha)010:545: de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:546: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo'i rtse mo zhags pa ltar byas te /
NK014(pha)010:548: ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen //
NK014(pha)010:549: rdo rje pad+mora sbyor bas ni //
NK014(pha)010:550: dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo //
NK014(pha)010:551: su ra ta badz+ra ma h+aa shap+ta su ke h'u h'u /
NK014(pha)010:552: phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste //
NK014(pha)010:553: bar chad med par thob par 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:554: khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na //
NK014(pha)010:555: sgra yis thos pa dngos grub bo //
NK014(pha)010:556: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo dang mthe bong lu gu rgyud ltar sbrel te /
NK014(pha)010:557: 'di ni blo ldan rab dgyes pa'i //
NK014(pha)010:558: rdo rje dpe med dri dang ldan //
NK014(pha)010:559: dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na //
NK014(pha)010:560: dbang phyug dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:561: su ra ta badz+ra ma h+aa g+han+d+ha su ke bam bam /
NK014(pha)010:562: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)010:564: bdag nyid rdo rjes brgyan pa yin //
NK014(pha)010:565: 'di ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen //
NK014(pha)010:566: rdo rje bsdams pa las mathe'u chung dang srin lag gi mtshams su mthe bong bcug nas bskyed de /
NK014(pha)010:567: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
NK014(pha)010:568: dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang //
NK014(pha)010:569: sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs dag /
NK014(pha)010:570: 'di yis rab tu dgyes par gyur //
NK014(pha)010:571: su ra ta badz+ra ma h+aa r+aa s+ye ho hoh dgyes pa chen po'i dri mchog gi //
NK014(pha)010:572: rgyal mtshan ldan ma zhes bya ba //
NK014(pha)010:573: sangs rgyas kun dang rol pa yis //
NK014(pha)010:574: mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur //
NK014(pha)010:575: de nas sat+wa 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor la bskor te nang du 'gro ba ni /
NK014(pha)010:576: drug skyes kyi glu rma bya myos pa'i nga ro lta bu dang sbyar te /
NK014(pha)010:577: lag gnyis phyir gdengs nas rkang g.yon 'degs chung /
NK014(pha)010:579: lag gnyis khu tshur g.yas g.yon steng 'og tu phyogs pa'i pad chung 'gying can /
NK014(pha)010:580: sata rkang g.yon rgyab tu nur te g.yas brkyang 'gying can dang /
NK014(pha)010:581: lag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar 'grengs stabs dang g.yon dkur brten /
NK014(pha)010:582: t+wa rkang g.yas grud de g.yon mdun du gom gang nur nas /
NK014(pha)010:583: kro d+ha g.yas brkyang 'gying can dang lag g.yas sdigs mdzub g.yon la bskor nas snying gar 'dzin cing /
NK014(pha)010:584: lag g.yon sdigs mdzub g.yon phyogs su 'phyar /
NK014(pha)010:585: ya rkang g.yas g.yon pa'i rtsar skyal te mnyam la /
NK014(pha)010:587: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil ba dang bcas
NK014(pha)010:588: pas rkang g.yon 'gro phyogs su sngon la bor pa'i
NK014(pha)010:589: gom chung gis 'gro ste g.yon pa'i 'gros so //
NK014(pha)010:590: yang lag gnyis phyir gdengs nas /
NK014(pha)010:593: sata rkang g.yas g.yas su 'then te g.yon brkyang 'gyings can dang /
NK014(pha)010:594: lag g.yas sdigs mdzub g.yon la bskor nas g.yas phyogs su 'phyar zhing g.yon sdigs mdzub thugs kar /
NK014(pha)010:595: t+wa rkang g.yon bteg tsam nas rkang g.yas mdun du gom gang nur la /
NK014(pha)010:596: kro d+ha la g.yas brkyang 'gying can dang /
NK014(pha)010:597: lag g.yon sdigs mdzub 'phyar zhing g.yas sdigs mdzub thugs kar /
NK014(pha)010:598: ya rkang g.yon g.yas pa'i rtsal skyal te mnyam la /
NK014(pha)010:600: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu gsil ba dang bcas
NK014(pha)010:601: pas rkang g.yas sngon la bor ba'i gom chung gis
NK014(pha)010:603: g.yas g.yon gyi 'gros gnyis po spel bas chas 'jug khang par rim gyis song la /
NK014(pha)010:604: gnyug mar gnas pa'i chas su byas te skabs ji lta ba'i cho ga'i dkyus la 'jug go //
NK014(pha)010:605: gzhan du tshogs kyi 'khor lo mtshan nyid pa dang 'brel ba lta bu la ni /
NK014(pha)010:606: sngar gyi lha mo bcu drug po'i gar song ma thag /
NK014(pha)010:607: lha mo de dag gis dbyangs dang bcas pas sbyor
NK014(pha)010:608: ba chen po la bskul ba sogs gsang ba'i spyod
NK014(pha)010:609: pa khyad par ba dang 'brel ba'i gar rnams kyang
NK014(pha)010:611: 'dir ni mchod gar tsam bsdus kyi de dag byed
NK014(pha)010:612: par spro na rong zom chen po'i tshogs yig sogs
NK014(pha)010:615: rdo rje'i lus kyi spyod pa rmad byung la //
NK014(pha)010:616: ye nas las dang dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs //
NK014(pha)010:617: 'di nyid yin zhes phyogs zhen rab rib dang //
NK014(pha)010:618: bral ba'i rnam dpyod mig ldan rnams kyis mthong //
NK014(pha)010:619: de phyir mchod sprin rnam pa thams cad par //
NK014(pha)010:620: spro ba'i rol mos rab 'byams dkyil 'khor kun //
NK014(pha)010:621: mnyes byed gar gyi bstan bcos sngon med 'di //
NK014(pha)010:622: gter chen bla ma'i zhabs sen nyi 'od rdul //
NK014(pha)010:623: spyi bo'i chu skyes ge sar dang 'grogs pa'i //
NK014(pha)010:624: smyos kyi ban chung d+harma sh+r+ais spel //
NK014(pha)010:625: tshul bzhin sbyangs pas 'khrul pa med snyam rlom //
NK014(pha)010:626: 'on kyang byis blos nongs na mkhas la bshags //
NK014(pha)010:627: 'dir 'bad dge bas 'gro kun gnyug ma'i lus //
NK014(pha)010:628: rdo rje zla ba stobs su gyur pa yis //
NK014(pha)010:629: 'gro ba'i lus kyi dri ma drung phyung ste //
NK014(pha)010:630: 'chi med sku yi rdo rjer byang chub shog //
